snippet.title: Tetragon — Release Trailer [PEGI]
snippet.description:
Tetragon is a vast mysterious universe of unique puzzles, magical mazes, and challenges! Your goal is to move the plane realities using the spinning world gravity wisely. Test your mind and guide the brave lumberjack through the scattered worlds in search of his lost son!

The full version of the game is already available on all platforms:
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1545850/Tetragon/
PlayStation: https://store.playstation.com/en-gb/product/EP5190-CUSA26699_00-TRGNMBPS400000EU/
Xbox: https://www.microsoft.com/p/tetragon/9PFD51VJH4XZ 
Nintendo: https://www.nintendo.co.uk/Games/Nintendo-Switch-download-software/Tetragon-2016594.html 

You can try the game by a free demo on Steam, as well as on Xbox One and Playstation 4 (with backward compatibility support on Xbox Series and PlayStation 5).
